title: Himi 459
lyrics:
7 & 10
1.
Tau fakataha ‘afē?
Te tau toe fakataha ‘i
he langi ‘apē.
2.
Te u lava fēfē ki ai?
‘I he ta’ata’a ‘o Sīsū te tau
lava ki ai.
3.
Te u kofu fēfē ‘i ai?
Ko e kofu hinehina hotau
kofu ‘i ai.
4.
Te u nofo fēfē ‘i ai?
He ‘alofi ‘o e ‘Eiki te tau
nofo ki ai.
5.
Te u ngāue fēfē ‘i ai?
Ko e fakafiefia ‘etau
ngāue ‘i ai.
6.
Te tau tutuku ‘afē?
Ko e nofo ‘i he langi ‘oku
ta’engata pē. *
